alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 2:50PM CDT until April 15 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN JACKSON COUNTY... At 250 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Mobile Regional Airport to near Moss Point, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Moss Point and Helena. This includes Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 68 and 76. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
